mapper.select: SELECT A.org_code zwbmbm,A.org_shortname zwbmjc,A.org_fullname zwbmmc, (SELECT COUNT(*) from dir_organize WHERE org_fcode LIKE CONCAT("%",A.org_code,"%")) as xsjgsl, IFNULL(C.ywsxsl,0) ywsxsl,IFNULL(B.xxzysl,0) xxzysl,IFNULL(B.sjxsl,0) sjxsl,0 xxzyxqsl,0 xxzybxqsl, case when A.org_category_code='Z' then '1' else '0' end type from ( SELECT org_code,org_fullname,org_shortname,org_category_code FROM dir_organize WHERE org_fcode='root' )as A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.org_code,COUNT(B.ID) xxzysl,SUM(B.sjxsl) sjxsl FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(FIND_ORG_PARENT(o.org_code),",",-1),",",1) org_code, ds.ID,dm.sjxsl FROM dataset AS ds LEFT JOIN dir_organize AS o ON ds.BELONG_DEP = o.uuid LEFT JOIN (SELECT DATASET_ID,COUNT(*) sjxsl from dataset_item_map GROUP BY DATASET_ID) as dm ON ds.ID=dm.DATASET_ID )as B GROUP BY B.org_code ) as B ON A.org_code=B.org_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.org_code,COUNT(c.ACTIVITY_CODE) as ywsxsl from (SELECT ard.ACTIVITY_CODE,SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(FIND_ORG_PARENT(o.org_code),",",-1),",",1) org_code FROM business_activity as ard LEFT JOIN dir_organize as o ON ard.BELONG_DEP=o.uuid) as C GROUP BY c.org_code ) as C ON A.org_code=C.org_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.org_code,SUM(b.xqcs) xxzyxqsl from (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX( FIND_ORG_PARENT (a.org_code), "," ,- 1 ), ",", 1 ) AS org_code, COUNT(A.SOURCE_DEP_ID) xqcs FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX( FIND_DIR_PARENT (dld.dir_code), "," ,- 2 ), ",", 1 ) AS zt, dld.set_code, br.ID, org.org_code, org.org_shortname, org.org_fullname, rdm.SET_NAME, SUBSTRING_INDEX(br.SOURCE_DEP_ID, "," ,- 1) SOURCE_DEP_ID FROM dir_lists_datasetmap AS dld RIGHT JOIN requirement_dataset_map rdm ON dld.set_code = rdm.SET_ID LEFT JOIN business_requirement AS br ON rdm.REQUIREMENT_ID = br.ID LEFT JOIN dir_organize AS org ON SUBSTRING_INDEX(br.SOURCE_DEP_ID, "," ,- 1) = org.uuid WHERE rdm.SET_NAME IS NOT NULL AND dld.set_code IS NOT NULL AND br.SOURCE_DEP_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY dld.set_code, br.SOURCE_DEP_ID ) AS A GROUP BY A.SOURCE_DEP_ID) as B GROUP BY b.org_code ) as D ON A.org_code=D.org_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d.org_code,SUM(d.bxqcs) as bxxzyxqsl from ( SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX( FIND_ORG_PARENT (a.org_code), "," ,- 1 ), ",", 1 ) AS org_code, COUNT(A.REQURE_DEP_ID) bxqcs FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX( FIND_DIR_PARENT (dld.dir_code), "," ,- 2 ), ",", 1 ) AS zt, dld.set_code, br.ID, org.org_code, org.org_shortname, org.org_fullname, rdm.SET_NAME, SUBSTRING_INDEX(br.REQURE_DEP_ID, "," ,- 1) REQURE_DEP_ID FROM dir_lists_datasetmap AS dld RIGHT JOIN requirement_dataset_map rdm ON dld.set_code = rdm.SET_ID LEFT JOIN business_requirement AS br ON rdm.REQUIREMENT_ID = br.ID LEFT JOIN dir_organize AS org ON SUBSTRING_INDEX(br.REQURE_DEP_ID, "," ,- 1) = org.uuid WHERE rdm.SET_NAME IS NOT NULL AND dld.set_code IS NOT NULL AND br.REQURE_DEP_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY dld.set_code, br.REQURE_DEP_ID ) AS A GROUP BY A.REQURE_DEP_ID )as D GROUP BY D.org_code ) as E ON A.org_code=E.org_code; ;

SELECT count(*) FROM `dir_organize` t LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(b.xxzysl) xxzysl,SUM(b.ywsxsl) ywsxsl,SUM(b.sjxsl) sjxsl, SUM(b.xxzyxqsl) xxzyxqsl,SUM(b.xxzybxqsl) xxzybxqsl,deprcode FROM ( (SELECT SUM(total) xxzysl,0 ywsxsl,0 sjxsl, 0 xxzyxqsl,0 xxzybxqsl,deprcode FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) total, CASE WHEN org_fcode='root' AND LENGTH(org_code=16) THEN SUBSTRING(org.org_code,1,16) ELSE SUBSTRING(org.org_code,1,12) END deprcode FROM `dataset` t1 LEFT JOIN `dir_organize` org ON org.`uuid` = t1.`BELONG_DEP` GROUP BY t1.`BELONG_DEP`) a GROUP BY deprcode)
UNION ALL ( SELECT 0 xxzysl,SUM(total) ywsxsl,0 sjxsl, 0 xxzyxqsl,0 xxzybxqsl,deprcode FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) total, CASE WHEN org_fcode='root' AND LENGTH(org_code=16) THEN SUBSTRING(org.org_code,1,16) ELSE SUBSTRING(org.org_code,1,12) END deprcode FROM `activity_rel_deps` t1 LEFT JOIN `dir_organize` org ON org.`uuid` = t1.`DEP_ID` GROUP BY t1.`DEP_ID`) a GROUP BY deprcode)
UNION ALL (SELECT 0 xxzysl,0 ywsxsl,SUM(total) sjxsl, 0 xxzyxqsl,0 xxzybxqsl,deprcode FROM (SELECT COUNT(t1.id) total, CASE WHEN org_fcode='root' AND LENGTH(org_code=16) THEN SUBSTRING(org.org_code,1,16) ELSE SUBSTRING(org.org_code,1,12) END deprcode FROM `dataset_item_map` t1 LEFT JOIN `dataset` t2 ON t2.`ID` = t1.`dataset_id` LEFT JOIN `dir_organize` org ON org.`uuid` = t2.`BELONG_DEP` GROUP BY t2.`BELONG_DEP`) a GROUP BY deprcode)
UNION ALL (SELECT 0 xxzysl,0 ywsxsl,0 sjxsl, SUM(total) xxzyxqsl,0 xxzybxqsl,deprcode FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) total, CASE WHEN org_fcode='root' AND LENGTH(org_code=16) THEN SUBSTRING(org.org_code,1,16) ELSE SUBSTRING(org.org_code,1,12) END deprcode FROM `business_requirement` t1 LEFT JOIN `dir_organize` org ON org.`uuid` = t1.`REQURE_DEP_ID` GROUP BY t1.`REQURE_DEP_ID`) a GROUP BY deprcode)
UNION ALL (SELECT 0 xxzysl,0 ywsxsl,0 sjxsl, 0 xxzyxqsl,SUM(total) xxzybxqsl,deprcode FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) total, CASE WHEN org_fcode='root' AND LENGTH(org_code=16) THEN SUBSTRING(org.org_code,1,16) ELSE SUBSTRING(org.org_code,1,12) END deprcode FROM `business_requirement` t1 LEFT JOIN `dir_organize` org ON org.`uuid` = t1.`SOURCE_DEP_ID` GROUP BY t1.`SOURCE_DEP_ID`) a GROUP BY deprcode) ) b GROUP BY deprcode ) c ON c.deprcode = t.org_code WHERE t.`org_fcode`='root' AND t.`org_status` = 1;
